summary:
Software engineer with a proven track record in developing complex algorithms and writing complicated software. I have more than a decade worth of experience working with a wide range of technologies. Iâ€™m flexible, creative and analytical. Fast learner. Love everything that has to do with game development.

Independently developed a unique incremental CSG (constructive solid geometry) algorithm. Created a level design tool, realtime-CSG, as a plugin for Unity, that uses this algorithm.

As an Independent game developer I created the game Gunship-X and the hit iOS game Zombie Gunship.

treasury_media: [{'url': 'https://www.gdcvault.com/play/1026755/Tools-Summit-Geometry-in-Milliseconds', 'title': 'GDC 2020: Geometry in Milliseconds: Real-Time Constructive Solid Geometry', 'description': 'A talk I gave about a novel iterative Constructive Solid Geometry algorithm I developed', 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/sync/C4E27AQGEXWd_m-c9kw/articleshare-shrink_800/0/1691483716600?e=1692936000&v=beta&t=iuwhcv0onknk6w8hMvsYRqPyWp_c6CxGlCqxkGzcOfw'}, {'url': 'http://realtimecsg.com', 'title': 'Lightning fast level design & prototyping tool', 'description': 'When designing or prototyping levels you want to iterate often and get feedback fast You want to be able to easily change things without having to worry about the consequences, you never want to redo lots of work because you changed you mind, you want...', 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/sync/C4D27AQHdlSsaHSI2MQ/articleshare-shrink_800/0/1691483718200?e=1692936000&v=beta&t=IeYQZgmVSNVuX2tU_TAYuzt6hwCNky90VcYnG-C_wMs'}, {'url': 'https://github.com/RadicalCSG/Chisel.Prototype', 'title': 'RadicalCSG/Chisel.Prototype', 'description': 'Work in progress prototype for the Chisel Level Editor, for Unity', 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/sync/C5627AQEdQLAxtJvPYw/articleshare-shrink_800/0/1649903813948?e=1692936000&v=beta&t=4G0-20H2qLnMchBGvhKDRd5C79U4q_nW3s7NsC5OjtA'}]

projects:
[{'title': 'Gunship X - iOS/PS4/Playstation Vita - Unity3D game', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'description': 'A spiritual successor to Zombie Gunship.
I wrote the AI (using behavior trees), game-play code, special effects code, wrote the shaders, UI and audio scheduling code for the game. The game was build on top of Unity.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sander', 'last_name': 'van Rossen', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Principal Software Engineer'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Serban', 'last_name': 'Porumbescu', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Postdoctoral Scholar at University of California, Davis'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Bryan', 'last_name': 'Bell', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Senior Product Designer at DuckDuckGo'}]}, {'title': "Minecraft like 'voxel world' concept", 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'description': "Click title to see video.
An experiment in rendering a minecraft like 'voxel' world. Worked on this now and then over the years, first version written in C#, second version written in C++. World is loaded asynchronously in chunks as the player moves through the world. Lighting for each chunk is calculated at load time and when the world is modified. Texture atlas is created at load time from source images and material definition text files. Blocks types (the 'voxels') are also defined in text files. Renders world using AZDO (Approaching Zero Driver Overhead) OpenGL techniques.
Old version (the one shown in the video) sorted the voxels for correct transparency, current version uses weighted blended order independent transparency.", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sander', 'last_name': 'van Rossen', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Principal Software Engineer'}]}, {'title': 'Zombie Gunship - iOS/Android game', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'description': 'I developed and designed the game Zombie Gunship in collaboration with Limbic software.
The concept of the game was based on my ideas, the game design itself was a team effort.
I wrote the rendering engine, the post processing effects and wrote pieces of the AI and gameplay.

Over 13 million downloads

Forbes - "Meet the real angry bird: the ultimate anti-zombie weapon." 
IGN Editors' Choice (9/10) "Amazing"

#1 Top Grossing app. 
#1 Top Paid Downloaded app.
